<title level="1" right="Rules">[Construct Trait](/Rules.aspx?ID=1603)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 32</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A construct companion has the [construct](/Traits.aspx?ID=35) trait. It's not a living creature, nor is it [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Construct Trait
